file_content.text: Well, what are you waiting for? You've done it. You've beaten me. Finish it now and be remembered forever as the hunter who killed the Eidolon.
I have other plans for you.
No, you're going to the Hutts.
Handing me over to the Cartel is the act of a brutish thug. You're better than that.
Because you're that important?
I don't lie and I don't exaggerate--never had to.
Listen to me. I'm appealing to your sense of honor, as an equal. Don't hand me over to the Cartel. Kill me now. I deserve that much.
You're just another job.
You're nothing. [Freeze him]
You put up a good fight.
True enough. [Kill him]
He killed your friend. You decide.
Mako, make the call.
He deserves to die, but nobody deserves what the Hutts will do to him. Give him what he wants.
As you wish.
Done. [Kill the Eidolon]
Fine, then you kill him.
You do it.
You think I won't?
For Anuli, you scumbag. No one messes with my family!
You're still way too emotional for this job, Mako.
That was a test. [Freeze him]
You can't do this! I'm the Eidolo--
Do me a favor. Next time, don't even bother asking me if you're just gonna ignore what I say.
I can still see Anuli's dead face. I can still hear his scream. He was my family. Give him to the Hutts.
You got it.
Done. [Freeze the Eidolon]
That's my girl. Money and revenge.
Right choice. [Freeze him]
You can't do this!
I'm the Eidolo--
I'll contact Solash and tell him to meet us at the spaceport. We can deliver the Eidolon and collect the bounty.
Good thought, but I don't want to haul his carcass around.
Nah. [Kill the Eidolon]
Anything to get you to shut up.
All right. [Kill the Eidolon]
Now... I truly am... a specter....
Unbelievable. Here you stand. Alive.
Who are you and why are you doing this?
I'm not here to talk to you.
Not your business.
Fair enough.
Sometimes a body gets bored and wants a challenge, you know?
I just like killing.
That's insane. By coming here you've assured your death, nothing more.
I'm just here for the credits.
You should have picked another career. Nothing for it now, I suppose.
It was a pleasure to meet you. Opponents like you are very rare--and precious. I regret having to kill you.
Wait! I just got a priority message from Solash. He's another Cartel lieutenant.
He's offering a huge bounty if you bring him the Eidolon. Alive.
We take him alive, then. Still counts as a successful hunt.
All right, new job parameters.
The Hutts want to do terrible things to you.
You hear that, Eidolon?
It's so much easier to just kill people.
I hate taking prisoners.
Oh, come now, you'll never claim that bounty!
But then, if we don't have our dreams, what do we have?
Come. It's time to die.
If you wish to meet me, come to these coordinates. I'll be sitting right here waiting for you.
Of course, the second you step out the door, you're dead. A shame, really, since our confrontation would've been most... exhilarating.
May as well. I suppose there'll be more droids?
On my way.
The ones you destroyed were trifles. The kind I send to kill rats.
Prepare to be impressed.
You don't know how much I want that to be true.
I'm going to kill you.
Likewise. And after, I'll admire your head on my wall every day.
Well, hunter, I'm sad to say this is goodbye.
Well, here we go. Let's be careful with this crazy.
But I will remember you. I promise.
Ah, there you are. It's been a bit of a challenge tracking you down. I figured you for a rogue agent, but the question was for whom.
I should've known. Gele'ren's the only one stupid enough to do this.
I'm actually a private contractor.
Not the only one.
Interesting. Gele'ren's head is being mounted on my wall as we speak. I know he was involved somehow.
Figured you'd be taller. Or a cyborg or something.
You're not very impressive.
I'm small enough to slip through a crack in a door, and large enough to loom over all of Nar Shaddaa.
I never figured the great Eidolon for a coward.
A man would've come in person.
Well, the night is young.
I must admit, I'm rather impressed that one person could be responsible for so much damage.
So much for the terrifying Eidolon.
That's over. [Kill him]
